P0472022.description: Magenta Only: Customers can get up to $600 off GS22 Series when they trade in an eligible device (new and existing customers qualify) on a qualifying rate plan - TFB Retail Only.
P0472022.promo_notes:
Two-tiered discount structure.
1. $700: All iPhones EXCEPT the iPhone 14 and 15
2. $730: iPhone 14 and 15 (including all memory variants) to have $730
Tier 1 $730: iPhone 15, iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPhone 14, iPhone 14 Plus, iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max
Tier 2 $700: iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPhone 14 Plus, iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max, iPhone 13 Mini, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max
